sentences.english: Hopefully he’ll bring the Planet of the Apes series back to life.
sentences.chinese: 希望導演能讓《人猿星球》系列重獲新生。

sentences.english: This time, two primitive ape-like creatures, believed to be a mother and her young son.
sentences.chinese: 此次發現的兩個類人猿是一位母親和他年青的兒子。

sentences.english: Apes and monkeys also have opposable thumbs on their feet that help their dexterity.
sentences.chinese: 類人猿和猴子腳部也有增加其靈敏性的對生拇指。

sentences.english: Darwin concluded that men were descended from apes.
sentences.chinese: 達爾文的結論是人由類人猿進化而來。

sentences.english: Simply copying the other great apes is therefore not an option.
sentences.chinese: 因此簡單地複製其他類人猿的飲食是不取的。

sentences.english: It is now generally believed that men are descended from the ape-men.
sentences.chinese: 今天人們普遍認爲人類是由類人猿進化而來的。

sentences.english: Human beings are evolved from ape-man .
sentences.chinese: 人類是由類人猿進化而成的。

sentences.english: Anthropologists have identified three major classes of human-like ape as living at that time.
sentences.chinese: 人類學家已經確認當時生活着三大綱類人猿。

sentences.english: There is nothing I, Ape-Man Daniel.
sentences.chinese: 我人猿泰牛是無所不知的。

sentences.english: Premier and Mrs. Yu had fun watching the monkeys on a trip to Leofoo Village Safari Park.
sentences.chinese: 賢伉儷於六福村野生動物園與人猿同樂。

sentences.english: Even Tarzan has a sweetheart and friends.
sentences.chinese: 即便是人猿泰山，也有他的戀人和朋友。

sentences.english: Men are descended from ape - men.
sentences.chinese: 人是由類人猿轉變而來的。

sentences.english: BCE 500.000 during the Stone Age there was a man-type of ape living in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 公元前50萬年，石器時代，類人猿在蒙古地區生活。

sentences.english: Here's a look at how they responded, from the great apes to the cuttlefish.
sentences.chinese: 來看看從類人猿到烏賊是如何面對地震的。

sentences.english: Of Renyard's new theory of species variegation in segmented arthropods?
sentences.chinese: 雷諾的分割類人猿物種多樣性的新理論有何評價？

sentences.english: I been holdin' off these apes all day.
sentences.chinese: 我已經一直拖延着這羣類人猿一整天了。
